about_the_game:
The first ever rifle designed from the ground-up for smokeless powder, the M1895 Repeater is a hunting rifle with a difference. With steady aim and incredible stopping power, it’s a must-have upgrade for any slayer wanting to hold back the army of the dead!
This Rifle Bundle contains;
M1895 Repeater
2 charms (Bash Cowboy Hat + Jade Cat)
2 bespoke weapon skins (SB Bronze + Jade).
detailed_description:
The first ever rifle designed from the ground-up for smokeless powder, the M1895 Repeater is a hunting rifle with a difference. With steady aim and incredible stopping power, it’s a must-have upgrade for any slayer wanting to hold back the army of the dead!
This Rifle Bundle contains;
M1895 Repeater
2 charms (Bash Cowboy Hat + Jade Cat)
2 bespoke weapon skins (SB Bronze + Jade).

name: Zombie Army 4: Repeater Rifle Bundle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10 64-bit / Windows 7 64-bit*
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 (or AMD equivalent)
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 1030 2GB (or AMD equivalent)
  • Additional Notes: *Windows 7 64-bit version 7601 supported only via the Vulkan launcher option.

short_description: The first ever rifle designed from the ground-up for smokeless powder, the M1895 Repeater is a hunting rifle with a difference.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
